title: OhMyFood
description: This project aimed to recreate the interface of a a new kind of restaurant I was asked to develop with SASS and implement alot of animations. This was a really good learning project. I discorvered Keyframes, BEM structure, SASS.

title: Sophie Bluel
byline: My first project working with an API for user login and data fetching
description: It was the first time I truly developped using JavaScript. This project made me learn about login functionalities, how to use an API and its endpoints. It was really entertaining, I learned how to manage a single page animation and how to handle data update without a page refresh

title: Nina Carducci
description: In this project, I learned about SEO - Search Engine Optimisation. I discovered and used alot of new tools, that I did not know about. All these tools have one goal : make sure your website will be seen. SEO is a webist optimisation for referencing and is composed of alot of different aspect, aspect that I studied in order to make a proper marketing website for example

title: Kasa
byline: Kasa was my first React project.
description: Kasa was my first React project. With this project I dived into the React world, learned about reusable components. I am, to this day still, learning a great deal about React and all its surrounding. For example, another project i'm working on is making me learn about React Redux and its toolkits.
